headline: WATCH: Kevin McCarthy signals on Fox there’s NO impeachment ahead if GOP takes House.
author: Fred T
sentences: Well later in the same hour she talked to House minority leader Kevin McCarthy and asked him straight up about impeaching Biden once Republicans take control of Congress.
A lot of websites, including Washington Examiner, are using the language of politicians and the MSM to say that McCarthy wouldn’t COMMIT to impeachment.
Bartiromo played a clip for him of Greg Murphy telling her on Friday that Biden has done more than enough to warrant impeachment.
But y’all, he was asked about it and said IF someone does something to warrant impeachment THEN we might.
Earlier y’all saw her absolutely stellar story on Hunter Biden and interview with Jim Jordan.
He isn’t just not committing, he’s telegraphing that it won’t happen.
Maria Bartiromo really delivered a stellar show on Sunday.
Which is the same thing as saying there won’t BE one.
That’s the same as saying Biden HASN’T done that.
But ol’ Kevin wasn’t feeling it, as the kids say.
Which is a no-brainer if you ask me.
